oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Telemedicine vignettes as a platform to enhance the quantity and diversity of clinical case exposure for veterinary students
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fajt, V. R.
Teller, L. M.
Stillisano, J.
Lubbers, B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The transition from veterinary school to practice can be chalÂ­lenging for a number of reasons, including lack of experience with managing primary care cases. Case-based approaches are often used to enhance student engagement but may fall short of increasing competence and confidence due to the nature of tertiary-care cases usually presenting to veterinary teaching hospitals.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 55 (2022): 2022 Annual Conference Proceedings; 198
